title: "Contributing"
---

## Contributors

Fork the repository, create a new branch, make your changes, and submit a pull request.

### Render the documentation

The documentation is rendered with [Quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/). Make changes to the `.qmd` files in the `docs` folder. Then run the following command to render:

``` bash
quarto render
```

## Maintainers

### Increment the version

Run the following command to increment the version:

``` bash
poetry version patch minor
```

### Publish the documentation

To publish the documentation to GitHub Pages, run the following command:

``` bash
quarto publish gh-pages
```
